about_the_game:
Includes "Don't open the doors!" Original Soundtrack with music by Skair in MP3 format (13 tracks).
Songs will be placed in your "Don't open the doors!" folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\doors_game\OST

Tracklist:
01. The Story Begins
02. Pumpkin Day
03. I Hate Bees!
04. The River
05. The Other Side of the Door
06. The Megabomb
07. Plasticine Tea Party
08. Ode to a Compote
09. Big Problem
10. Dungeons and Mushrooms
11. Ray Wouldn't Mind
12. Monochrome
13. Lost FOREVER
